body_html: @cpuhrsch I created a PR to ifdef the partitioner. I'm having some internal discussions on getting a fix for TBB scheduler for ppc64le. I'll let you know which version the fix will be in once its merged. I also tried the latest version of TBB and it fails the same way.
body_text: @cpuhrsch I created a PR to ifdef the partitioner.  I'm having some internal discussions on getting a fix for TBB scheduler for ppc64le.  I'll let you know which version the fix will be in once its merged.  I also tried the latest version of TBB and it fails the same way.
body: @cpuhrsch I created a PR to ifdef the partitioner.  I'm having some internal discussions on getting a fix for TBB scheduler for ppc64le.  I'll let you know which version the fix will be in once its merged.  I also tried the latest version of TBB and it fails the same way.
